content: great read Tim Denning. You need to give up on all the points mentioned by you so succinctly to be successful. One more to the list which I have observed is that “Successful people give up on toxic relationships”,whether at office or at home.They have a knack of either to convert the toxicity of that relationship into positivity or straight away come out of it if it is hurting them.They don’t waste their productivity on appeasing toxicity .
